gcci.text: H100 pricing at $3.30/hr is stabilizing as US‑East supply chain expansions ease chip bottlenecks, enabling more predictable capex planning.

gtpi.text: With input tokens averaging $1.45/1M, the intensifying API price war is pushing developers toward more efficient model distillation to cut costs.

gagl.text: A 160 TWh annual load underscores grid strain, prompting a strategic shift toward nuclear baseload to curb carbon emissions and secure energy for AI clusters.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment remains cautiously optimistic despite bubble concerns, as sustainable growth in AI workloads drives disciplined investment.
